scripts.bench:graphlit: bun run src/index.ts run -p graphlit -m gpt-5.2 -j gpt-5.2
scripts.bench:graphlit:locomo: bun run src/index.ts run -p graphlit -b locomo -m gpt-5.2 -j gpt-5.2
scripts.bench:graphlit:longmemeval: bun run src/index.ts run -p graphlit -b longmemeval -m gpt-5.2 -j gpt-5.2
scripts.bench:graphlit:convomem: bun run src/index.ts run -p graphlit -b convomem -m gpt-5.2 -j gpt-5.2
scripts.bench:graphlit:quick: bun run src/index.ts run -p graphlit -b locomo -l 5 -m gpt-5.2 -j gpt-5.2
